wikipedia_page.main: Thomas "Tom"/"Tommy" C. Askin (24 June 1905 – 14 January 1976) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1920s and 1930s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and Yorkshire, and at club level for Knottingley Rovers ARLFC, Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 64), Leeds, Castleford (Heritage № 98) and Newcastle. He usually played as a wing or centre.
